name: ColdFusion: Avoid Functions with more then XX Lines of Code
description: Functions should not have more than X lines of code. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Functions with more than X lines of code.
It provides the following information:
- Function full name
- Number of lines of code
rationale: Large Functions are more difficult to understand, and are a sign of a bad modularity of the code
remediation: Review the design of the Function to reduce its size
